missionText: To ensure the contribution of the Green and Digital Office to the implementation of the sustainable development strategy of I. Razzakov Kyrgyz State Technical University through the integration of environmental, digital, and innovative solutions into the educational, scientific, and management activities of the university, promoting the formation of a sustainable, resource-efficient, and digitally oriented university environment.
goals: Institutionalization of sustainable development principles in the management system, educational programs, and scientific research at KSTU
Formation of an environmentally responsible and digitally competent university environment for students, faculty, and staff
Development and implementation of the «green and digital university» model, taking into account national priorities and international sustainable development standards
Support for digital transformation of key university processes, including education, science, and administration
Expansion of international cooperation and integration of KSTU into the global educational and scientific space in the field of sustainable development
Improving the university's position in international rankings and sustainable development initiatives
tasks: Coordination of sustainable development activities at KSTU
Participation in the implementation of the Erasmus+ GREENKG project
Development and implementation of «green» and digital initiatives
Organization of training seminars, workshops, and lectures
Support for student and faculty initiatives
Monitoring and analysis of sustainable development indicators
